TLT : Transformer-Lightning Language Model

This is an implementation of a transformer based language model using Pytorch-Lightning framework. The model consists of two transformer layers with 2 heads each combined with embedding and linear layers. The code uses Pytorch Lightning framework that is built for fast research prototyping!

pytorchtransformerlanguage_modelcross_entropypytorch_lightning
Batch Inverse-Variance Weighting: Deep Heteroscedastic Regression

This a Pytorch implementation of Batch Inverse-Variance Weighting Deep Heteroscedastic Regression, Mai et al 2021.An approach to include privileged information in the loss function of the deep learning models, together with dataset statistics inferred from the mini-batch to mitigate the impact of the dataset misalignment, by adapting the idea of Fisher-information weighted average to function approximation.

Researchpytorchsupervised_learninguncertainityheteroscedasticityRobotics
PianoNotes-LSTM: PianoNotes LSTM Generation

This is a PyTorch Implementation for LSTM-based Music model that generates piano' notes using Nottingham' Dataset.

pytorchlstmmusic_modelingmusic_generation
LSTM-Lang: LSTM Language Generator

A simple PyTorch Implementation for an LSTM-based language model.

pytorchlstmlanguage_modelnll_loss
Neural Network in Embedded Systems

This project aims to test the computation efficiency of the feed forward Neural Network (NN) algorithm in STM32F0 microchip using pima indians diabetes dataset.

Cembedded systems
Piano-VAE: Piano Variational Autoencoder

This is a Pytorch implementation of a musical model that capable to generate piano'notes and interpolate between them as the model latent space is continuous. The model is a variational autoencoder where the encoder and the decoder are LSTM networks.

Pytorchlstmvaemusic_generation
NeurIPS2018 Challenge: RL for Prosthetics

Applying set of Reinforcement Learning (RL) algorithms to train a realistic biomechanical model to work with different people and on different walking environments.

Reinforcement learningtransfer_learningopensimimitation_learningtrpoddpgppochainerrlneuripsprosthetics
T5WikiX: T5 Fine-tuning on Wikihow and XSum.

This is a Pytorch implementation of a summarization model that has been fine-tuned on the top of Google-T5 pre-trained model. The implementation uses HuggingFace `transformers` and `datasets` libraries while model has been fine-tuned on two public summarization datasets, Wikihow and Xsum.

nlp pytorchtransformersummarizationrouge-lwikihowxsumhugging-facet5-model
LSTM-VAE: LSTM Variational AutoEncoder

This is a PyTorch Implementation of Generating Sentences from a Continuous Space by Bowman et al. 2015. where LSTM based VAE is trained on Penn Tree Bank dataset.

nlplstmvaekl_divergenceelboreconstruction_error
